verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> something <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5193>glass<s%> <S%G3396>mixed<s%> with <S%G4442>fire,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those who <S%G3528>overcame<s%> <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G1537><s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1504>image,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537><s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name,<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5193>glass,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2788>harps<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They <S%G103>sang<s%> the <S%G5603>song<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> the <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5603>song<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3173>"Great<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2298>marvelous<s%> are <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G3841>Almighty!<s%> <S%G1342>Righteous<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G228>true<s%> are <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3598>ways,<s%> you <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G40>nations.<s%>

<S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G5399><s%> <S%G3364>wouldn't<s%> <S%G5399>fear<s%> <S%G4571>you,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G3686>name?<s%> <S%G3754>For<s%> you <S%G3441>only<s%> are <S%G3741>holy.<s%> <S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1484>nations<s%> will <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> <S%G4675>you.<s%> <S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> righteous <S%G1345>acts<s%> have been <S%G5319>revealed.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3326>After<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> I <S%G1492>looked,<s%> <S%G2532%G99999>and<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of the <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%G3142>testimony<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%> was <S%G455>opened.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G1520>One<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> living <S%G2226>creatures<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G5357>bowls<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> who <S%G2198>lives<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165>forever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3485>temple<s%> was <S%G1072>filled<s%> with <S%G2586>smoke<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1411>power.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> No <S%G3762>one<s%> was <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4127>plagues<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> would be <S%G5055>finished.<s%>
